duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development and submission of medical and scientific publications in collaboration with internal and external stakeholders.
Collaborate internally to support the planning, execution, and management of clinical trial activities.
Develop a medical communication strategy and drive engagement with internal and external stakeholders.
Identify and build relationships with key external stakeholders and ensure the successful dissemination of innovative clinical information to thought leaders.
Oversee engagement with professional societies and industry organizations focused on advancing clinical knowledge and practice.
Support the development of departmental budget, forecasting, and long-range planning, and tracking operational expenses.
Infuse the patient perspective and strategic insights from patient advocacy group partners into the business, leveraging existing initiatives and new opportunities to inform and influence strategy.

education_certification.credential: Advanced science degree with 10+ years of related experience within the pharmaceutical industry. Degree in pharmacy or advanced degree in science/medicine (MD, PhD, MD/PhD, DNP, or PharmD)
